mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAM_USERS (USER_ID, USER_PW, USER_NAME, USER_LOCATION, USER_AGE, ROLE,TEAM_NAME,TEAM_JOIN) VALUES (#{userId}, #{userPw}, #{userName}, #{userLocation}, #{userAge}, #{role},null,null)
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM TEAM_USERS WHERE ROLE = 'ROLE_MEMBER' OR ROLE = 'ROLE_ADMIN' AND TEAM_NAME = #{teamName} and TEAM_JOIN = 'ACCESS'
SELECT * FROM TEAM_USERS WHERE ROLE = 'ROLE_ADMIN' AND TEAM_NAME IS NOT NULL
SELECT * FROM TEAM_USERS WHERE TEAM_NAME = #{teamName} and TEAM_JOIN = 'STANDBY'
